data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Kaôh Kong, Cambodia to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kaôh Kong, Cambodia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 2,857 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Kaôh Kong, Cambodia, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Kaôh Kong, Cambodia to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Khmer people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
God, we pray for the believers in Kaôh Kong, Cambodia to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Kaôh Kong, Cambodia.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.section_summary:
the state of Kaôh Kong, Cambodia has a population of 139,700.

We estimate Kaôh Kong has 2,857 people who might know Jesus, 1,940 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 134,903 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 48 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Kaôh Kong, Cambodia not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

location.name: Kaôh Kong
location.cities_list: Koh Kong, Smach Mean Chey, Khlong Yai, Srae Ambel, Bak Khlang
location.cities_list_w_pop: Koh Kong (33,134), Smach Mean Chey (29,329), Khlong Yai, Srae Ambel, Bak Khlang
